name: Terracotta Cylinder Planter
details: Classic hand-crafted terracotta planter with a smooth matte finish, perfect for succulents and small plants. Ideal for natural aesthetics and breathability.
reviews: Beautiful rustic look, fits perfectly on my window sill!
Very sturdy and great for my succulents, allows good drainage.

name: Ceramic Glazed Blue Pot
details: Elegant glazed ceramic planter with rich blue finish, adding sophistication to home decor. Suitable for both indoor and balcony plants.
reviews: Absolutely stunning color, adds charm to my living room!
Perfect size for tabletop plants, love the glossy finish.

name: Concrete Minimalist Planter
details: Raw finish concrete planter with a minimal design for modern decor. Suitable for cacti and succulents, includes drainage hole.
reviews: Love the industrial look, very chic!
Perfect size for my desk cactus. Sturdy build.

name: Hanging Metal Planter (Gold)
details: Elegant golden metal hanging planter for small indoor plants. Adds a modern touch to your balcony or living space.
reviews: Looks stunning hanging by my window!
Very sturdy and shiny, holds small pots easily.

name: Plastic Self-Watering Pot (White)
details: Smart self-watering plastic pot with detachable base. Great for indoor plants with low maintenance needs.
reviews: Perfect for my busy schedule, plants stay hydrated!
Looks neat and simple, very functional.

name: Hand-painted Ceramic Pot (Floral Design)
details: Charming hand-painted ceramic pot with colorful floral patterns. Perfect to brighten up your garden or balcony.
reviews: Such a beautiful design, makes my plants look special!
Gorgeous and well-made, great for gifting.

name: Rectangular Balcony Rail Planter (Green)
details: Durable rectangular railing planter for balconies. Made from weather-resistant plastic and includes metal hooks.
reviews: Fits perfectly on my balcony railing, looks lovely with flowers!
Good quality plastic, hooks are strong.

name: Macrame Hanging Planter (Cotton)
details: Stylish macrame hanging planter made from 100% cotton. Perfect for adding a boho vibe to any indoor space.
reviews: Such a pretty addition to my room. Love the boho look!
Strong and well-made, holds my pot securely.
